title: Thunderbird V115.5.0 (on Debian Linux) - Can't Find the "Font Toolbar" in email "Write" window ... Where is it?
content:
Thunderbird V115.5.0 (on Debian Linux) - Can't Find the "Font Toolbar" in email "Write" window ... Where is it?

I've been using Thunderbird as my email client for decades. After a recent upgrade to software on my Debian Linux PC, I cannot find nor enable the "Font Toolbar" that was once available within the Write Window. I'd like to continue to employ Thunderbird as my email client, but this feature/capability is a necessity.

The "Font Toolbar" enables one to modify the size, color, and spacing(s) of characters, letters, words, and/or paragraphs, and one may also adjust the super- or sub-script, underlining, over-lining, etc., of the same.

I've just spent several hours attempting to enable this, searching and trying lots of bad ideas on the local Thunderbird GUI's settings. Still.... NO TOOLBAR! This is very disturbing for me. Given the plethora of search results returned during searches, this has been recurring for a good long time. There are lots of folks with this or very similar problems.

I'd like to continue using and enjoying what I have thought was a very good contribution to the globe for use on all sorts of operating systems. For decades, I've solely used Linux. I've liked Mozilla software from the get-go, and this has happened just once before several years ago. Luckily, there was a way to enable it in the "about:config" settings. Today, I couldn't even find a way to enter those settings in this newest version of Thunderbird - V115.5.0.

If the toolbar is still a feature, how do I enable it?
creator: cpkern

title: Cannot unsubscribe specific folder
content:

我通过qq邮箱官方网页版登录的时候没有找到这个文件夹。显示订阅地址是imap://[MYACCOUNT]%40qq.com@imap.qq.com/%26UXZO1mWHTvZZOQ-，推测%26UXZO1mWHTvZZOQ-是文件夹在服务器中的名字。 I can't find this folder when I log in through the official web version of qq mail. It shows the subscription address as imap://[MYACCOUNT]%40qq.com@imap.qq.com/%26UXZO1mWHTvZZOQ-, presumably %26UXZO1mWHTvZZZOQ- is the name of the folder in the server.

我不清楚问题出在thunderbird的客户端还是qq邮箱的服务器上。我希望能够取消这个文件夹的订阅。 I'm not sure if the problem is with the thunderbird client or the qq mail server. I would like to be able to unsubscribe from this folder.

title: Zálohování emailových účtů v Thunderbird
content:
Ahoj přátelé, prosím o informaci k dotazu. Mám Win.10, 64bit, a ohledně emailů program Thunderbird. V něm mám 4 účty 2 účty na volny a 2 účty na Forpsi (ty jsem měl při podnikání). Nyní potřebuji 2 účty na Forpsi zrušit, ale zachovat veškeré emailové zprávy kterých je dost. Převézt je do složky Dokumenty, kde zřídit na ně samostatnou složku, nebo je převézt na záložní disk. Ale 2 účty na volny musím zachovat jako dále fungující ! Po zazálohování emailů bych účty z Forpsi zrušil. V případě potřeby mohu poslat doplňující informace.

Děkuji za pomoc a zdravím, Zdeněk Fořt.
creator: zdenekfort1

title: probleem openen mailprogramma
content: Beste , ik heb de 128.1.0esr geinstallerd ( via update) Ik heb een 10 mailadressen erop, heeft steeds goed gewerkt tot die update. 4 mailadrssen via proximus 1 mailadres via acount 01 google 1mailadres via acount 02 google 1mailadres via acount 03 google 1mailadres via acount 04 google 1mailadres via scarlet 1mailadres via outlook als ik mijn mailprogramma open , komt er nu een venster op dat ik moet klikken om goed te keuren van google, er komen zo een 15 vensters open na elkaar, dus ben een tijdje bezig ermm, het het steeds onder de naam van goole account 01 ( hoofdaccount) Ik heb het mailprogramma al gedesinstalleerd, hetzelfde probleem, dan nog eens met revo, na installatie hetzelfde probleem, rare is dat hij automatisch de mailadressen herneemt na installatie. Ik hoop dat e riemnd een oplossing weet voor dit probeem. Ik heb op mijn reserveschijf (cloon) een ouder programma lopen van thunderbirth, hier geen enkel probleem. heel veel dank
creator: wcochuyt

title: IMAP vs POP
content:
If my email provider's server was originally POP but my provider's moving to IMAP there's a good chance they'll temporarily support both versions.

And I've discovered that I can set up a 2nd email account in Thunderbird and link it to their IMAP server. Both email accounts will then download the same emails.

But of course my POP account (locally) will have a whole history of emails whereas the new IMAP account won't.

So rather can creating that 2nd email account, is it possible to set up (i.e. convert) the existing account so that it'll access the IMAP server, rather than the old POP one? I tried opening its Server Settings in Thunderbird and simply changing the Server Name and Port but that doesn't work. The Server Type remains as POP and even the Advanced settings don't offer any clue :-(
creator: john391

title: Two-line signature: how to create one
content:

Anyway. I want a signature that looks like this: John H. Smith jsmith@something.com

I entered it in the sig file box exactly this way, but when I compose an email, it looks like this: John H. Smith jsmith@something.com

I tried turning on HTML, and adding an extra <carriage return><linefeed>, both to no avail.

Your thoughts?

Thanks!
